articles.title: Marina Mabrey’s foul on Caitlin Clark upgraded to Flagrant-2, AP source says - AP News
articles.description: The WNBA has upgraded the technical foul on Connecticut’s Marina Mabrey for shoving Caitlin Clark to the floor during Tuesday’s night game against Indiana to a Flagrant-2. That's according to a person familiar with the situation who spoke to The Associated Pr…
